sentence: Knicks GM Scott Perry drafted Fox during his short stint in Sacramento after being fired by Orlando.

title: Julius Randle, De’Aaron Fox set to face off in potential trade showcase

sentence: “I trust Leon and Wes and Scott,” Randle said of the Knicks braintrust — president Leon Rose, senior adviser William Wesley and general manager Scott Perry.
